title: In Queue bug
body: So just now I try to play some ARAM games and soon as I click find match, the queue goes on and after a minute it shows I have declined the game. There is literally no Play button pops up at all. And After few try still same issue and it tells me if I do this more I will get punished by not readying the game?  plz help.

replies.body:
That will happen if your network's connection isn't up to speed with where the client is with your queue. What happens is the queue tells your client that it's found a match, but your network doesn't interpret that signal fast enough to tell you, then the timer runs out. 

Let's adjust your network settings to make sure you're able to get those messages in time so that you don't keep missing your queue's. Typically, updating your Port Forwarding and DNS settings can give you a cleaner connection with our servers, but make sure you do the other steps listed in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if those don't seem to help. Also, make sure to test these changes in a custom/practice game so you don't get hit with a leaverbuster for missing those queues.
